hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha:The Prophet (ﷺ) called the Salamander, a mischief-doer. I have not heard him ordering that it should be killed. Sa`d bin Abi Waqqas claims that the Prophet (ﷺ) ordered that it should be killed

chapter.ara-name: باب خَيْرُ مَالِ الْمُسْلِمِ غَنَمٌ يَتْبَعُ بِهَا شَعَفَ الْجِبَالِ
chapter.eng-name: The best property of a Muslim will be sheep
